item.title: Did it rain or snow on ancient Mars? New study suggests it did
item.description: Geologists weigh in on a long-running debate about Mars: Billions of years ago, was the Red Planet warm and wet or cold and dry?

item.title: Wild chimps filmed sharing 'boozy' fruit
item.description: Wild chimpanzees have been pictured eating and sharing fruit containing alcohol.
